name: MAC Address to Manufacturer
description: MAC Address Lookup to find the hardware manufacturer and its postal address of a specific MAC Address

api_methods.name: maclookup
api_methods.description: Enter MAC Address (string) to find the manufacturer. MAC Formats Allowed: ('xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx', 'xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx', 'xxxx.xxxx.xxxx', 'xxxxxxxxxxxx')

parameters.name: mac_number
parameters.description: MAC Address Number to Find Manufacturer

utterances.utterance: Who manufactured the device with MAC address 14-AB-C5-D5-DA-F9?
Can you tell me the manufacturer of the MAC address 00:1A:2B:3C:4D:5E?
Find the hardware manufacturer for MAC address 1234.5678.9ABC.
What company made the device with MAC address A1B2C3D4E5F6?
Who is the manufacturer of the MAC address 6A-7B-8C-9D-E0-F1?
Can you identify the manufacturer for MAC address 11:22:33:44:55:66?
Find the postal address of the manufacturer for MAC address ABCD.EF12.3456.
What is the manufacturer of the device with MAC address 9A8B7C6D5E4F?
Who produced the hardware with MAC address 1A-2B-3C-4D-5E-6F?
Can you find the manufacturer for MAC address 00:11:22:33:44:55?
